articles.author: Jack Newsham, Katherine Tangalakis-Lippert
articles.title: 4 top partners quit Paul Weiss, Big Law firm that cut deal with Trump - Business Insider
articles.description: The four litigators, who have represented major tech companies and Democratic power players, announced Friday they are starting their own firm.
articles.content:
Four partners at Paul Weiss announced Friday that they are leaving the white-shoe firm, which two months ago struck a deal with the Trump administration.
Karen Dunn, a star litigator who has helped … [+3711 chars]
